title: Hewlet
author: Hewlet
content: You know the saying that "it is easier said than don" na when you meet real life situation na then e go make much sense to you.My man when done de accumulate him bitcoin de make mouth say him no de lay hand on am till him done accumulate the bitcoin reach point when him fit use am start up better business when go de fetch am money on a regular, as Christmas done de approach, the guy man don de reason how to sell part of the bitcoin go lavida for Villa o!This one just remind me say to fit successfully carry out any long term goal eh, e go require you to de patient and not to allow any short time excitement deprive you of what lies ahead of you.I feel say so many of us de this category when no de fit even see money for account and allow some things to fly past us, we go wan check am out because say we get the money at hand.As we de prepare to go into the festive season when de take money from our hands, make we also know say their is life after Christmas oh! No go sell all your Bitcoin holding use impress village people ohMerry xmass and prosperous new year in advance my Nija people.

comments.author: Churchillvv
comments.body: Waytin be life if you no enjoy? Abeg make everybody enjoy oo because na one day you go kpie. If na for you to sell Bitcoin chop be the thing sell am I support you üòÇ As light warrior die like this him BTC way him family no know about do go be that oo. And him no chop the accumulation again oo so if u get Bitcoin way u fit sell to enjoy your self my brother sell no mind weytin we de talk for forum oo we get life outside here. But if you sell am too wey people wey hold their own become rich later at least you no go loss you go still be their gate man üòÅ

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: OP you really know what is happening in this festive period because almost every one falls in this category of spending our savings money for an event that will just end in a day and afterwards we start feeling the pain of spending money extravagantly just to impress people around us like buy costly shoes, wear expensive clothes and put on luxurious jewelries just to feel proud and big when after the festive period every one return to square one. This has really been a major challenge in the society and I don't know why humans will just give a particular month not even a month, just a particular day as utmost priority that if you don't meet up like others it will look as if you're the worst person in the society therefore people spend all the whole savings they've made for the year just for Christmas, even when Christ himself didn't celebrate his birthday while he was on earth.After all the whole spending then from January people start suffering and finding it difficult to feed and do other necessities of life. The earlier people understand that there is life after Christmas, the better for them. Me I live my life not to impress anyone but myself that's why at a time when others are crying of how hard the economy is on them I just laugh and say that the economy isn't affecting me in any way Well, any Bitcoin investor will know that Bitcoin requires a long interval of time before your investment can mature then after which you can start using it to make transactions. Our focus for now is to buy and accumulate more Bitcoin as we can be able to afford. Anyone who is into Bitcoin investment should have an alternative means of getting money so that they won't tamper with the Bitcoin they have acquired so anyone that withdraw their Bitcoin just to impress people doesn't have the ability of an investor and such a person may run into series of problems because he can't save money for the future.

comments.author: Obim34
comments.body: This na wetin dey funny me for the our country, anytime e reach this kind of festive season na so everywhere go dey shake, dey bubble people go dey squander their money no be say dey too get but they no want make people look dem less. Most of them sef dey take loan,some dey even spend the one dey don gather from the beginning of the year just to faji during the season but no be say e bad to enjoy but make we try also dey strategies ourself cos no body know wetin the upcoming year hold so na just to dey careful dey spend.OP, on the norms dat ur friend get enough right to withdraw him money from Bitcoin cos na him money him take invest and na from him portfolio but try let am know say him go regret by the time him don faji finish den come see the direction which Bitcoin go take very soon dat alone fit be him biggest regret. So u fit let am know before him take any action.

comments.body: Nah only person wey no no the value of bitcoin nah em go sell in investment go they do jolly for village. ¬†E good make you chop your money but e no make sense say money wey you invest you come commot am when e never reach the goal or target. comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: The essence of Bitcoin potentialities of ¬†creating incomes and wealth is all to solve investors/humans needs that is financially sorted.The hodling, accumulating including the trading and Investing for short-term and the long-terms goal are still buttress to solve financial needs of now (present) and then (future). The reality truth is that you live to see today looking forth to tomorrow's but must be conscious of consumptions regarding that tomorrows well fair is uncertain so you have to get it readily planned earlier.I don't blame those who intended to hodling their Bitcoin for a long period of time but had to temper with your trading coins.This is not just about being tempted to temper ones Bitcoin supposed to hold for a long period of time but it is about obtaining an essential commodities.For goodness sake you can tend to have the mansions on the earth while you are battered with rains and hitted by the sun out there.Yeah... It is wise advisable to hold oneself and keep accumulating your Bitcoin nomatter what but till when?I think this is literally why it is necessary to either diversify your Bitcoins port folios or diversification of investment and trades for alternative source of income to solving the present financial challenges While your Bitcoin is in orderly accumulating as the investors could holder.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: One thing about bitcoin is that you can't hodl it when you don't have a source of income , it is very impossible to bitcoin when you have important needs to spend with money or when you need money feed yourself. ¬†People are able to hodl bitcoin because they have a source of income, ¬†I think this the challenge when it comes to hodling of bitcoin, ¬†if anyone must think about hodling I think it is important their should be steady source of income to make hodling work.

comments.author: Yorubek
comments.body: We all wan make we try our best to upgrade ourselves. If I reason am like person wey invest for Bitcoin, I suppose hold my coins according to my goals. I dey glad well for this moment to know say I get community wey dey discuss crypto matter well well. As I dey newbie, I don learn from browsing the forums say to hold bitcoins na the best move to make. But e no easy to hold am because everybody need money. Especially when festive days show, na so people dey yarn. But I believe say if person get strong mind to achieve e goal and fit manage small enjoyment for short time, I sure say the next festive days go better.

Just imagine the regret he would feel after selling a portion to enjoy, then the bull run comes , that's going to be really messy on his side.And after patience to aquire one needs to have self control not to use it for the wrong reasons.

comments.author: Mayor of ogba
comments.body: QuoteAs light warrior die like this him BTC way him family no know about do go be that oo. The person who posted about the death of Light Warrior in the forum said that his child knows about Light Warrior's BTC wallet, but she doesn't know how to access her father's Bitcoin. Op e mean, say that your friend only invests in bitcoin for the short term and anytime we dey festive period, he has no choice but to sell his bitcoin holdings to buy things for the festive period. Naim make e no good to invest in bitcoin if you no get another source of income that will take care of your financial challenges.
